title: [Snyk] SNYK-DEBIAN13-ZLIB-15307854 in zlib/zlib1g@1:1.3.dfsg+really1.3.1-1+b1
description:
## Improper Validation of Specified Quantity in Input

**Severity:** low
**Package:** zlib/zlib1g@1:1.3.dfsg+really1.3.1-1+b1
**File:** `score-processor-lambda/Dockerfile`

**CVSS Score:** 5.5  
**Snyk Priority Score:** 221/1000

### CVEs
- [CVE-2026-27171](https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2026-27171)

**Fix:** No automatic fix available. Review manually.

### Details
## NVD Description
**_Note:_** _Versions mentioned in the description apply only to the upstream `zlib` package and not the `zlib` package as distributed by `Debian`._
_See `How to fix?` for `Debian:13` relevant fixed versions and status._

zlib before 1.3.2 allows CPU consumption via crc32_combine64 and crc32_combine_gen64 because x2nmodp can do right shifts within a loop that has no termination condition.
## Remediation
There is no fixed version for `Debian:13` `zlib`.
